segments.text: Along with it is a flat thin object moving as the other object moves.

critique: 1. The description of the object’s appearance is missing, and there doesn’t seem to be a flat, thin object moving along with the other object.

captions.single: The video is in black and white and blurred. It shows an object that is moving back and forth in a straight line. Along with it is a flat thin object moving as the other object moves.
